name: Kitchen Chef: Cooking Manager
description:
Kitchen Chef is a beautiful kitchen game that tests your crazy cooking chef skills, time management & serving skills so as to serve the hungry customers & make them happy. Meet unique customers at party in restaurant, serve and delight them with new rich and delectable food recipes, and earn Coins and Tips. You have to serve customers who visit your restaurant simulator with quality food and speed in order to win popularity and earn money. Make customers happy by revealing the master chef inside you & write your own kitchen story. Kitchen game cooking food fever is back especially for the home cooking chef who have cooking craze, it’s more than fun to take food orders from the happy customers. Use your authentic crazy cooking chef recipes and special ingredients to prepare a delicious meal. So Fire up your kitchen stoves & start writing your kitchen story in this fun time management crazy cooking game and create your own restaurant story to be told over and over among friends & family.

Kitchen Chef is an addicting time management crazy cooking game that features endless play. Kitchen Chef teaches you how to cook delicious dishes and manage your own restaurant simulator and become a true chef master in kitchen chef cooking world! You can cook for multiple customers at same time to improve your crazy cooking chef & time management skills within your cafe or restaurant simulator. So take command of the kitchen game and demonstrate the skills of a master cooking chef. Choose the right ingredients according to your customer’s choice otherwise you’ll have to throw it in the trash. The customers and food orders will increase with your increasing chef popularity on city street. Make the best cooking craze strategy that will help you earn coins and unlock exciting crazy cooking world food items and utensils to expand your food business and cater more customer in minimum time. Remember don’t let the diner get angry at their food orders. Become a cooking craze star chef and build your bakery, cafe, diner or restaurant simulator in crazy cooking world the best food and drinks in a kitchen game that lets you play as a restaurant manager.

Kitchen Chef Stand Features:
* Race against time to prepare catering orders.
* Unlock new recipes and grow your food menu.
• Cook, grill, and serve food by using simple TAP.
* Cook on multiple stoves and serve a variety of meals.
* Fulfill the orders of Hungry Customers in cooking world.
* Earn money and great prizes for finishing catering orders!
• It is a FREE game + No Wi-Fi is required to play this cooking game.
* Become the master of this kitchen game & cooking world!
